Teaching Statistics with R
======================================
Materials from a 2013 USCOTS Workshop
------------------

You can find materials from other Project MOSAIC presentations
at the main USCOTS meeting at 
[uscots.mosaic-web.org](http://uscots.mosaic-web.org)

```{r, echo=FALSE}
displayFile <- function(path, text=path, type=c('html','Rmd','Rpres')) {
  result <- paste(text, paste("[[", type, "] ](", path, ".", type, ")", sep="", collapse="" ) )
  return(result)
  }
```

### The Purple, the Yellow, and the Blue

Workshop participants were given copies of three "books", affectionately referred to by the 
colors of their covers:

 * Purple: [Start Teaching with R](http://mosaic-web.org/go/Master-Starting.pdf)
 
 * Yellow: [A Compendium of Commands to Teach Statistics with R](http://mosaic-web.org/go/Master-Core.pdf)
 
 * Blue: [Start Modeling with R](http://mosaic-web.org/go/Master-Modeling.pdf)

### Other things

 * `r I(displayFile("Workshop/Welcome/Welcome", "Welcome and Introductions"))`
 
 * [Roadless America Data Reporting](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1bMYIQNkB-A4aT5fzE1L39hUN3UQ5iPVxSoQpIG0U8e0/viewform)

 * Resources posted by Presenters and Participants on [RPubs](http://http://rpubs.com/uscots2013/)

### R Minis
These are some slides that Randy Pruim put together for some recent talks.  They are produced using beamer/latex/knitr.  The source Rnw files (but not all of their dependencies) are available so you can see how these were done.

* Getting Started with R 
([pdf](http://www.calvin.edu/~rpruim/talks/Rminis/RStartingUp.pdf),
 [Rnw](http://www.calvin.edu/~rpruim/talks/Rminis/RStartingUp.Rnw))
 
* Formulas in R 
([pdf](http://www.calvin.edu/~rpruim/talks/Rminis/FormulasInR.pdf),
 [Rnw](http://www.calvin.edu/~rpruim/talks/Rminis/FormulasInR.Rnw))
 
* Modeling and Simulation 
([pdf](http://www.calvin.edu/~rpruim/talks/Rminis/ModelingAndSimulation.pdf),
 [Rnw](http://www.calvin.edu/~rpruim/talks/Rminis/ModelingAndSimulation.Rnw))
 
* A Mosaic Sampler 
([pdf](http://www.calvin.edu/~rpruim/talks/Rminis/MosaicSampler.pdf),
 [Rnw](http://www.calvin.edu/~rpruim/talks/Rminis/MosaicSampler.Rnw))
 
* Linear Algebra for Statistics 
([pdf](http://www.calvin.edu/~rpruim/talks/Rminis/LinearAlgebraForStats.pdf), 
 [Rnw](http://www.calvin.edu/~rpruim/talks/Rminis/LinearAlgebraForStats.Rnw) )


<!-- ### Files by topic -->
```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
directories <- dir('Workshop')
files <- c()
for (d in directories){
  inProgress <- FALSE
  files <- dir(paste('Workshop/',d, sep=""))
  for (f in files) {
    if (grepl('.html', f) ) {
      if (!inProgress)  cat(paste('\n####', d, "\n"))
      inProgress <- TRUE
      cat(paste(' * [',d, "/", f,']', sep=""))
      cat(paste('(',d, "/", f,')\n', sep=""))
      }
  }
}
```
